title: Ticket #7621: Failure to fail parsing in classad_eval
description:
The following is wrong: 

$ classad_eval 'x = y; y = 7' 'x'
undefined

One correct answer would be fail because the first argument isn't a valid ClassAd. Another possibility, more user-friendly, would be to try to reparse the first argument with surrounding brackets.

See also #7341 as a possible extension.
check_ins: 2020-Apr-28 00:43   Check-in [59507]: (#7621) Parse the whole ad string or not at all. If not at all, try adding square brackets around the ad string (for user-friendliness). Includes release notes and documentation. (By Todd L Miller )
creator: tlmiller
